update t_user_back_question
userId = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

update t_user_back_question set userId = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, messageTitle = #{messageTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, messageContent = #{messageContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, messageType = #{messageType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, orderInfoId = #{orderInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, backContent = #{backContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doneContent = #{doneContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, serviceState = #{serviceState,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from t_user_back_question c
where 1=1
and c.id = #{id}
and c.userId like concat ('%', #{userId},'%')
and c.messageTitle like concat ('%', #{messageTitle},'%')
